Classes in se.nicklasgavelin.sphero.exception used by experimental.test
InvalidRobotAddressException
          Thrown if the Robot class is tried to be initialized with a Bluetooth device that is not covered by the API.
RobotBluetoothException
          Thrown if the Robot fails to initialize (and discover available services) over the Bluetooth connection given
